name: William L. Steiger
content: Home Page for William Steiger William Steiger Professor Department of Computer Science Rutgers, the State University of NJ 110 Frelinghuysen Road Piscataway, NJ 08854-8019 USA Phone: (848) 445-7293 FAX: (732) 445-0537 Email: steiger@cs.rutgers.edu Office: Hill 417 Research My research interests are in theoretical computer science, currently leaning towards combinatorial and computational geometry, and to probability. Some Past Papers Classes, Office Hours, Etc. In Fall 2019 I will teach CS442--- PROBABILISTIC ALGORITHMS and CS323--- Numerical Analysis OFFICE HOURS: Thursday 2:00 - 3:00PM, and by arrangement Related Links at Rutgers Department of Mathematics DIMACS Rutgers Info System Search Facility
